options.name: Bounty Hunter
options.description: Gain +1 Senses and the ability to collect trophies from defeated targets. Each trophy gives you a +1 bonus to tracking similar creatures.

options.name: Skilled Tracker
options.description: Gain +1 Senses and the ability to follow tracks that are up to 7 days old.

options.name: Trophy Collection
options.description: Trophies collected from powerful enemies provide you with specific bonuses related to their abilities or weaknesses.

options.name: Relentless Pursuit
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed when tracking a specific target. You gain advantage on Senses checks to track a target you've wounded.

options.name: Action : Mark Target
options.description: Designate one creature within sight as your bounty. You gain +1d4 to Attack and Damage rolls against this target until they are defeated or you designate a new target.

options.name: Reaction : Pursuit
options.description: When your marked target attempts to flee or move away from you, you can move up to half your movement speed to follow them.

options.name: Dead or Alive
options.description: You can choose to deal non-lethal damage with any weapon without penalty. Gain +1d4 damage against targets that have less than half their maximum health.

options.name: Action : Binding Capture
options.description: Make an attack roll with a 1d4 penalty. If successful, the target is restrained. They must succeed on a Strength check to break free.

options.name: Enhanced Trophy Benefits
options.description: The bonuses you gain from trophies increase by +1, and you can now benefit from up to 3 trophies simultaneously.

options.name: Master Bounty Hunter
options.description: You gain the ability to track targets across any terrain with no penalty. Your marked target cannot benefit from invisibility, hiding, or similar effects against you. Additionally, gain +1 to Attack and Damage against marked targets.
